content.title: Configuring the Else Condition
content.body:
1. From the Action Editor canvas, select the IF: Recipients.opstatus is equal to 0 node.
  2. From the left menu of the Action Editor, under the Condition section, select Else.
  3. From the left menu of the Action Editor, under the Client section, select Show Alert.
  4. In the right pane of the Action Editor, provide the following fields:
    • Alert Type: Info
    • Alert Message: "Sorry, your recipient details could not be edited successfully. Please try again later"
  5. Click Save.
